channel.title: QoL things who we need as players
channel.description:
Hi there. Im Alan#7191
I think its time to make a thread about that "Little things" we need in the game to improve the experience.
**1- Premade logs and Death Notes**
We need an option to use our own Logs and Death notes with a simple click during the game. That would sabe a lot of time and would be a nice option.
**2- Spectator mode**
We need this for tournaments! not that much to say, we need a option to see our friends play!
**3- More Death Note colors**
Not that much to say about this one. We need colors.
**4- The King should have a different color in chat**
Maybe if the king has a yellow name instead of a blue one, it would be easy to know the King is talking and get leads from him.
**5- Using the Keyboard instead of Mouse option**
It would be amazing for me if abilities, logs, class card, private notes, psychic can be attached to a keyboard command. Could save some seconds :D
**6- Remove friends from friend list/chat with friends/etc**
Nothing to say here, we need this.
**7- More things in the shop (PLEASE)**
Boslof said they will add emotes, but I think is not enough. We need colors, Icons for the username, More armors and weapons, and Really expensive/rare items. 3000 gold is really cheap.

item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Cuatrolan:

1- Premade logs and Death Notes

We need an option to use our own Logs and Death notes with a simple click during the game. That would sabe a lot of time and would be a nice option.

death notes I’m in favor of, logs I’m not so sure. The big issue with logs is they have to be easy to fake. If real logs are instantanious and there’s any kind of reason for any delays or imperfections in fake notes, it adds a huge problem for evils

2- Spectator mode

We need this for tournaments! not that much to say, we need a option to see our friends play!

fully agree, I think there should be 2 forms of spectator modes

  1. referee/recorder - for private games only, one person is designated as that position. This person can see all night chats, actual classes etc…

  2. Public spectators - this can join any games that are going on, but they do not see anything that isn’t publicly seen by all players. There cannot be any kind of advantage to spectating your own game.

3- More Death Note colors

Not that much to say about this one. We need colors.

4- The King should have a different color in chat

Maybe if the king has a yellow name instead of a blue one, it would be easy to know the King is talking and get leads from him.

nothing I like or dislike here, relatively minor changes that some people will like so, sure /support

5- Using the Keyboard instead of Mouse option

It would be amazing for me if abilities, logs, class card, private notes, psychic can be attached to a keyboard command. Could save some seconds

100% support, something like a
/d1 15 (uses first day ability on player 15) etc…

and yeah no complaints here of hotkeys for pulling up logs etc…

6- Remove friends from friend list/chat with friends/etc

Nothing to say here, we need this.

7- More things in the shop (PLEASE)

Boslof said they will add emotes, but I think is not enough. We need colors, Icons for the username, More armors and weapons, and Really expensive/rare items. 3000 gold is really cheap.

more relatively indifferent stance here lol
